altername_name: SDガンダム Gジェネレーション ワールド
name: SD Gundam: GGeneration World
overview: This collector's box contains: SD Gundam G Generation World The DVD Portrait of the Red: Char to Frontal Special Edition. This video presentation features Shūichi Ikeda recounting the story of the character he's lent his voice to for 40 years: Char Aznable. This special edition DVD also includes an interview. Shūichi Ikeda's script for Portrait of the Red.
